name: Create new LionDesk contacts from Google Forms responses
description: Every time a new Google Forms response is submitted, Make will automatically validate the email from the response using ZeroBounce. If the email status is "valid" it will get the person's details using Clearbit. If there is a result it will create a new contact on LionDesk and send a Slack message. If the contact already exists on LionDesk it will send a Slack message. This example uses the response sheet in [this link](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1ywFP36iduqwZW1s2UFSToJeVj0KEkrOSayqvKFriCXI/edit#gid=720174809).
